title: Motsoeneng given notice to attend SABC disciplinary hearing
text:
Cape Town - SABC COO Hlaudi Motsoeneng has been given notice to attend a disciplinary hearing at the end of the month, according to an affidavit he filed.
“On October 12, 2015, the SABC initiated disciplinary action against me by delivering a charge sheet and a notice to attend a disciplinary hearing on October 30, 2015,” he stated.
It was not immediately clear what the charges against him were.
The affidavit accompanied his application to the Constituional Court for leave to appeal a recent Supreme Court of Appeal (SCA) judgment.
